title: Champion Mastery - Issues with loading screen badge and emote
body:
Hi Everyone,

Thanks to your reports, we were recently made aware of an issue with Champion Mastery badges and emotes not showing up even though you may have achieved the necessary rank on OCE.
We've determined the cause of this issue and will be launching a fix early tomorrow morning.

Let us know if you still experience any issues with Champion Mastery after tomorrow's fix. Thanks!

replies.body: >still haven't gotten any champion to a high enough level yet to test this

DW horse, i'll give it a check myself for you ;)
It'll be truly outrageous.

Awesome. I was wondering about this today, I had the emote and loading screen badge for one game and then after that nothing. So glad it is getting fixed soon!

We are planning to do this fix tomorrow at 4:30am AEDT. Players may experience a brief disconnection from the platform during this work, but games would not be affected. Once this is complete, Champion Mastery will be working as intended.
